channel.title: Whaat?
channel.description:
Iran Giving Arms To Iraq's Sunnis, U.S. Military Says Washington Post BAGHDAD, April 11 -- The chief U.S. military spokesman in Iraq asserted Wednesday that Iranian-made arms, manufactured as recently as last year, have reached Sunni insurgents here, which if true would mark a new development in the four-year-old conflict. http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2007/04/11/AR2007041102121.html
Well. That would make sense...If Shi'a Islam wasn't the [b]official state religion[/b] of Iran. And according to [url=http://www.time.com/time/covers/0,16641,20070305,00.html]Time Magazine[/url] the Sunni's and Shi'ites really hate eachother. Right? So why would Iran be helping the Sunni's?
Bush knows, but he's the [url=http://movies.crooksandliars.com/TDS-Bush-Iran-IE.mov]only[/url] one.

item.title: Whaat?

Yes, The end of the world as we know it, Kim Jiung and his bombs, Muhhamid Ali and his gang, Barnie and his so called “Friends”, Hitler and his Worshippers, The Pope and his “Worshippers”,Bush and his Addministation, My Dad and your Mum + a hunk of cheese, Napeolan and his Dynamite, And now this…Yesss…

item.title: Whaat?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Iran Giving Arms To Iraq’s Sunnis, U.S. Military Says
Washington Post
BAGHDAD, April 11 – The chief U.S. military spokesman in Iraq asserted Wednesday that Iranian-made arms, manufactured as recently as last year, have reached Sunni insurgents here, which if true would mark a new development in the four-year-old conflict.
http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2007/04/11/AR2007041102121.html

Well. That would make sense…If Shi’a Islam wasn’t the official state religion of Iran. And according to Time Magazine the Sunni’s and Shi’ites really hate eachother. Right? So why would Iran be helping the Sunni’s?

Bush knows, but he’s the only one.

Read full topic
